recovery_sheet_backup_local.message: If you would like to exclusively save your data locally on your computer, you will find this option in the encrypted communication settings of your [BRAND] account.

recovery_sheet_backup_server.message: To back up the data that is important for encrypted communication (e.g. key password), the data will be saved encrypted on our [BRAND] servers by our security partner Mailvelope.

recovery_sheet_check_settings.message: Please check the settings in your account under:

recovery_sheet_creation_date.description: Label for recovery sheet creation date

recovery_sheet_data_lost.message: Without a backup, your encrypted messages cannot be decrypted again in case you lose your key password or in case of a defective device or problems with the browser extension!

recovery_sheet_enter_code.message: For the installation on other computers, enter the recovery code in the settings under:

recovery_sheet_explain_pgp.message: Encrypted communication with [BRAND] is a PGP-based procedure. It enables you to send encrypted emails and, at the same time, ensures that only you and the receiver are able to read them.

recovery_sheet_extension_problems.message: because of problems with the browser extension

recovery_sheet_forgot_password.message: because you forgot the password to your key

recovery_sheet_further_info.message: You can find more information and setting options in your [BRAND] account under

recovery_sheet_invite_contacts.message: In your encrypted communication settings of your [BRAND] account, you have the possibility to invite additional contacts to use encrypted communication via PGP. Contacts that have already been invited successfully can be recognized by the padlock icon next to the email address.

recovery_sheet_keep_safe.message: Store a print-out of this document in a safe place and make sure no one else has access to the recovery code.

recovery_sheet_key_server.message: Other [BRAND] users who are using the PGP procedure of GMX can be directly found in a central directory in your [BRAND] account. If you do not want to have any entries in this directory, please deactivate this function in your [BRAND] account settings.

recovery_sheet_not_working.message: If your encrypted communication is no longer working, e.g.:

recovery_sheet_other_devices_setup.message: Setting up encrypted communication on other devices

recovery_sheet_pgp_compat.message: You can communicate securely with other contacts if they are also using encrypted communication (PGP).

recovery_sheet_print_block.message: Please store this document in a safe place!

recovery_sheet_print_notice.message: Proszę wydrukuj ten dokument i przechowuj go w bezpiecznym miejscu!

recovery_sheet_qr_code.message: Przeskanuj kod QR swoim urządzeniem mobilnym.

recovery_sheet_trusted_contacts.message: With GMX contacts you can be sure that the users displayed are in fact valid users. You should, however, always verify the identity of contacts with an email address from another email provider.

recovery_sheet_unknown_third.message: Only set up encrypted communication on secure devices that cannot be accessed by strangers.

recovery_sheet_unlock_backup.message: The backup of your data can only be decrypted with the help of the recovery code on this recovery sheet.

reload_tab.message: Please reload the corresponding pages for the settings to take effect.
